p: The reported cases of COVID-19 were collected from December 8, 2019 to March 12, 2020 using Tencent real-time tracking [ 6], Ifeng real-time tracking [ 7] and data from the National Health Commission of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China [ 8]. Our data include new infections, new cures, new deaths, daily recoveries, cumulative diagnoses, cumulative discharges, and cumulative deaths each day. Because our data were on a daily basis, our model was iterated to produce daily results.
